question: Which of the following clearly define the Syndicate Underwriting?
option1: It is underwriting in which, two or more agencies or underwriters jointly underwrite an issue of
option2: It is one in which an underwriter gets a part of the issue further underwritten by another agency.
option3: It is one in which the underwriters apply for a block of securities.
answer: It is underwriting in which, two or more agencies or underwriters jointly underwrite an issue of
explanation: Syndicate Underwriting is one in which, two or more agencies or underwriters jointly underwrite an issue of securities. Such an arrangement is entered into when the total issue is beyond the resources of one underwriter .
